摚字的基本解释

摚
chēng
古同“撑”，支撑。
触；撞：“（虎）若恃爪牙之利，必昏黑摚突。”

摚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chēng］
［《集韻》徒郎切，平唐，定。］
［《集韻》除庚切，平庚，澄。］
(1)支撑；抵挡；遮挡。
(2)指撑船。
(3)接触；推。

摚字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　摚； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页449第36
【集韻】徒郞切，音唐。【博雅】距也。又除庚切，音棖。義同。或作䟫。又作蹚。

摚字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
摚字的起名意思

暂无。

Yan
Basic explanation of words
Yan
chēng
Gu Tong "supports" and supports.
Touch; bump: "If (tiger) takes advantage of his claws, he will be dark and sudden."
Yan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [chēng]
["Jiyun" Tu Langqie, Ping Tang, Ding. ]
["Ji Yun" except Gengqie, Ping Geng, Cheng. ]
(1) Support; resist; shelter.
(2) Refers to punting.
(3) Contact; push.
Yan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　摚; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 449 36
[Jiyun] Tu Yunqie, Yin Tang. [Bo Ya] Distance also. In addition to Gengqie, Yinxi. The same meaning. Or as Tong. Make another trip.
